data.title: 准备以至少20秒的时间回答以下问题
data.answer: When people travel to some places, it's relatively easy for them to see and buy some counterfeits that look exactly the same as genuine commodities. I personally think that it is a very negative phenomenon and may largely harm the economy. For example, fake goods production and retailing will force the genuine brand to spend a large amount of time and money on fighting against the fake production industry. Therefore, this practice may decrease the profit of the authentic brand. In addition, after recognizing that they have bought fake products, people may gradually lose confidence and interest in buying products in the local market, which will damage the local economy. (112字)
data.referenceText: In many places, it's possible to buy fake goods that look like authentic brand-name items. What effects on the economy does this practice have?
data.referenceTranslate: 在很多地方都可以购买看上去像正宗品牌商品的假冒商品。这种做法对经济有什么影响？
